item.title: Burger Tycoon
item.description:
Run your own fast-food empire! In this game your task is to manage a multinational fast-food company. Your management begins on the land plots, where you will grow livestock (cows) and corn to feed them.

The feedlot where your cows are fattened and processed into burgers.

The store where you have to manage the staff in order to serve your clients efficiently.

The headquarters, where you invest in advertising campaigns and corrupt influential people to keep your costumers/profit coming.
